title: Precipitous decline of inpatient population of

content.description: The precipitous decline of the inpatient populations of state and county mental hospitals since the 1950's can be attributed to which of the following?
content.question: I. Declining incidence of severe mental illnessII. A policy of deinstitutionalizationIII. New drug therapies

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
